Export.Routine: COMTable ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; NOTE : Some variables (e.g. gblnUsePaging) are not newed. They retain their ; existence during processing and are killed when processing is complete. ; ; History: ; 03-Dec-2009 GRF Boolean Macros; coding standards ; 04-Nov-2004 GRF Add doco ; 13-May-2004 GRF include COMSYS rather than SYSDisc ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- #include COMSYS DisplayGrid(pobjData,pblnIncludeNewLineLink=1,pstrOrder="ASC") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Builds a grid out of the passed in data ; ; History: ; 12-Mar-2003 shobby If already posted don't display the 'New' line. ; 10-Mar-2003 shobby Allow grid sort order to be controlled. ; 07-Mar-2003 shobby Creation ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnAllowLinks,blnNewLine,blnOrder,idx,lstHeadings,strHighlightIdx set pstrOrder = $zconvert(pstrOrder,"U") do Start(@pobjData@("!!Headings"),@pobjData@("!!Title")) set blnAllowLinks = '$get(@pobjData@("!!Posted")) set blnOrder = $select(pstrOrder="ASC":1,pstrOrder="DESC":-1,1:1) set strHighlightIdx = $get(@pobjData@("!!Highlight")) set idx = "" ; FIXME : Brace format; idx is prefix not variable name for set idx = $order(@pobjData@("!!Data",idx),blnOrder) quit:idx="" do . set blnNewLine = $listget(@pobjData@("!!Data",idx,"Date"),1) . if (blnNewLine'="[New]") || (pblnIncludeNewLineLink&blnAllowLinks) do . . do NewLine($select(strHighlightIdx=idx:"lightgreen",1:"")) . . do PackageLine(pobjData,idx,@pobjData@("!!Headings"),blnAllowLinks) . . do EndLine() do Stop() quit PackageLine(pobjData,pidx,plstHeadings,pblnAllowLinks=$$$YES) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Pull apart each line and convert to cells in a grid ; ; History: ; 13-May-2004 GRF Clarify If Test ; 12-Mar-2003 shobby Don't display a line based on a parameter pblnAllowLinks. ; 07-Mar-2003 shobby Creation ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnClearIfZero,i,intColumns,objCell,strAlignment,strData,strLinkForm new strLinkKey,strLinkParameters,strType set intColumns = $listlength(plstHeadings) ; FIXME : Brace format for i=1:1:intColumns do . set objCell=$get(@pobjData@("!!Data",pidx,$listget(plstHeadings,i))) . if $$$ALWAYS do ;if objCell'="" do . . set strData=$listget(objCell,1) . . set strType=$listget(objCell,2) . . set strLinkForm="" . . set strLinkKey ="" . . set strLinkParameters="" . . if pblnAllowLinks do . . . set strLinkForm =$listget(objCell,3) . . . set strLinkKey =$listget(objCell,4) . . . set strLinkParameters=$listget(objCell,5) . . set strAlignment =$listget(objCell,6) . . set blnClearIfZero=$listget(objCell,7) . . if strType="Text" do InsertCell(strData,strLinkForm,strLinkKey,strLinkParameters,strAlignment) . . if strType="Date" do InsertCellDate(strData,strLinkForm,strLinkKey,strLinkParameters) . . if strType="Boolean" do InsertCellBoolean(strData,strLinkForm,strLinkKey,strLinkParameters) . . if strType="Currency" do InsertCurrencyCell(strData,blnClearIfZero,strLinkForm,strLinkKey,strLinkParameters) . . if strType="" do InsertCell("") quit FormatCurrency(pstrAmount,pblnHideZeros=$$$NO,pstrCurrencyOverride="",pidLang="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Wrapper for WWWZAHL. Adds currency symbol and formats an amount to ; how the system is currently set up. ; ; History: ; 23-Mar-2005 PO SR11349 FC support ; 23-Mar-2005 RPW SR10961: Allow the users to pass in a different currency ; so that if we are not using the default currency this ; still works. ; 24-Feb-2005 SteveS Commented - cleaned up If test. ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strResult,strCurrency,strCVRate,strJustify set strResult="" ;if pstrCurrencyOverride="" { ; if $case($$$CurrencyToUse,"Foreign":1,"Either":1,:0) { ; set pstrCurrencyOverride=$$$FCur(pstrAmount) ; set pstrAmount=$$$FCAmount(pstrAmount) ; } ;} if $get(pstrAmount)'="" { if ('pblnHideZeros && (+pstrAmount=0)) set pstrAmount = 0.00001 if ( pblnHideZeros && (+pstrAmount=0)) set pstrAmount = "" set strCurrency = $select(pstrCurrencyOverride="":YWHR,$$$YES:pstrCurrencyOverride) set strCVRate = "" if pstrCurrencyOverride'="" set strCVRate = 1 set strJustify = strCVRate if pidLang'="" set SPRACHE = pidLang if pstrAmount'="" set strResult = $$^WWWZAHL(pstrAmount,0,2,strCurrency,"",strCVRate) } quit strResult InsertCell(pstrText, pstrForm="", pidTran="",pstrParam="",pstrAlignment="", plngPage="",plngSpan="",pintSize=2,pstrWindow="",pblnWrap=$$$NO) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Inserts a cell into a grid ; ; Params : ; 1 pstrText Cell - Contents (Link - Hyperlink) ; 2 pstrForm Link - YFORM (Form name) ; 3 pidTran Link - YKEY ; 4 pstrParam Link - YPARA & YAUSWAHL ; 5 pstrAlignment Cell - ALIGN [LEFT, RIGHT, CENTER] ; 6 plngPage Link - YSEITE (Page/Tab Number) ; 7 plngSpan Cell - COLSPAN ; 8 pintSize Cell - font-size [1-7] ; 9 pstrWindow Link - new window ; 10 pblnWrap Cell - NOWRAP ; ; History: ; 04-Jan-2012 shobby SR17973: Removed   ; 20-Dec-2006 JW SR14235: Changed param from pstrExtra to pstrWindow. ; 28-Feb-2006 JW SR13697: Added spaces ; 20-Jan-2006 GRF Doco ; 21-Sep-2005 JW SR13309: If text is all spaces convert. ; 13-Sep-2005 RPW SR13306: Increase the column count for non paging as well. ; 12-Apr-2005 SS SR10923: Added pintSize ; 01-Mar-2004 PK Added Column Span Param ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if $get(pstrAlignment)="" set pstrAlignment = "Left" if $$IsList^COMUtils(pstrText) set pstrText = $$DecodeError^COMUtilError(pstrText) if $translate(pstrText,$$$SPACE)="" set pstrText = " " if gblnUsePaging { set @gStorage@(glngRow,glngColumn) = pstrText_Y_pstrForm_Y_pidTran_Y_pstrParam_Y_pstrAlignment_Y_plngPage_Y_plngSpan set glngColumn = glngColumn+1 } else { do NewField(pstrAlignment,gColour,plngSpan,pintSize,pblnWrap) ;write " " if pidTran'="" { do InsertLink(pstrForm,pidTran,pstrText,$get(pstrParam),$get(plngPage),,pstrWindow) } else { write pstrText } ;write " " set glngColumn = glngColumn+1 do EF^WWWTAB } quit NewField(pstrAlignment,pstrColour,plngSpan="",pintSize=2,pblnWrap=$$$NO) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; 06-Jul-2011 shobby SR18056: Padding changes from Brasil. ; 21-May-2010 shobby SR17315: IE and FF manage absolute-size fonts differently ; 13-Sep-2005 RPW SR13306: Parse the font size into a style format. ; This is used as the font information here is overwritten by innerText. ; Added an id to the cell or (Row * 100) + Col ; 12-Apr-2005 SteveS SR10923: Use pintSize (was hard-coded to 2) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strSize ;set strSize=$case(pintSize,1:"xx-small",2:"x-small",3:"small",4:"medium",5:"large",6:"x-large",7:"xx-large",:"small") set strSize=$case(pintSize,1:"7.5pt",2:"10pt",3:"12pt",4:"13.5pt",5:"18pt",6:"24pt",7:"36pt",:"12pt") write YCR,"" quit InsertCellPercentage(pstrValue,pstrForm="",pidTran="",pstrParam="",plngPage="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History: ; 19-Feb-2003 shobby Creation ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- set pstrValue=$$Round^COMUtils((pstrValue*100))_" %" do InsertCell(pstrValue,pstrForm,pidTran,pstrParam,"Right",plngPage) quit InsertCurrencyCell(pstrValue,pblnClearIfZero=$$$NO,pstrForm="",pidTran="",pstrParam="",plngPage="",plngSpan="",pstrSize=2) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History: ; 23-Mar-2006 PO SR14407: Added plngSpan & pstrSize ; 19-Feb-2003 shobby Creation ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if (+pstrValue=0) && pblnClearIfZero { set pstrValue = "" } else { set pstrValue = $$FormatCurrency(pstrValue) } do InsertCell(pstrValue,pstrForm,pidTran,pstrParam,"Right",plngPage,plngSpan,pstrSize) quit InsertCellDate(pstrValue="",pstrForm="",pidTran="",pstrParam="",plngPage="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History: ; 19-Feb-2003 shobby Creation ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strDateTime set strDateTime = $$^WWWDATE(pstrValue) if $piece(pstrValue,",",2)'="" set strDateTime = strDateTime_" "_$$^WWWTIME(pstrValue) do InsertCell(strDateTime,pstrForm,pidTran,pstrParam,"Left",plngPage) quit InsertCellTime(pstrValue="",pstrForm="",pidTran="",pstrParam="",plngPage="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History: ; 31-Jan-2006 JW SR14215: Included in patch ; 07-Dec-2005 SteveS Creation ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strTime set strTime = $$^WWWTIME(pstrValue) do InsertCell(strTime,pstrForm,pidTran,pstrParam,"Left",plngPage) quit InsertCellBoolean(pblnValue,pstrForm="",pidTran="",pstrParam="",plngPage="",pblnSuppressNo=$$$NO) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Inserts a boolean cell ; ; History: ; 14-Jan-2004 Paul K Added pblnSuppressNo ; 19-Feb-2003 shobby Creation ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strValue set pblnValue = +pblnValue set strValue = $get(^WWW100(0,"JA/NEIN",SPRACHE,pblnValue,1)) if pblnSuppressNo && 'pblnValue set strValue = "" do InsertCell(strValue,pstrForm,pidTran,pstrParam,"Left",plngPage) quit InsertCellCheckbox(pstrText,pstrRoutine,pblnIsChecked,pblnReadOnly) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Add a checkbox to the COMTable ; ; Params: ; pstrText : The text which can be anything, ie a key ; pstrRoutine : The routine to call back, it gets passed two values, the text from the ; previous parameter and the checked state of the checkbox ; pblnIsChecked: If this radio button is selected ; pblnReadOnly : If this checkbox is readonly ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 23-Sep-2005 RPW SR13304: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- do InsertCell("",,,,"Center") quit InsertCellRadioButton(pstrText,pstrRoutine,pblnIsChecked,pblnReadOnly,pstrGroup="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Add a radio button to the COMTable ; ; Params: ; pstrText : The text which can be anything, ie a key ; pstrRoutine : The routine to call back, it gets passed two values, the text from the ; previous parameter and the checked state of the checkbox ; pblnIsChecked: If this radio button is selected ; pblnReadOnly : If this radio button is readonly ; pstrGroup : The name of the group of radio buttons, to which this belongs ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 23-Sep-2005 RPW SR13304: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if pstrGroup'="" set pstrGroup = "name="_pstrGroup do InsertCell("",,,,"Center") quit InsertCellCallback(pstrText,pstrRoutine,pstrParams="") // NOT IN USE ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Write a hyperlink which performs a cach√© callback (instead of ; going to another form) ; ; Params: pstrText : The text for the link ; pstrRoutine : The routine to run (X^Y) ; pstrParams : The parameters to use (p1,p2,...,pn) ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 21-Feb-2006 SteveS SR14110: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new intNumParams,loop,strHTML set intNumParams = $length(pstrParams,",") set strHTML=""_pstrText_"" do InsertCell(strHTML) quit InsertCellJS(pstrText,pstrJS="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Write a hyperlink which performs JS (instead of going to another form) ; ; Params: pstrText : The text for the link ; pstrJS : The JS to run ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 01-Mar-2006 JW SR14110: Created (replaced routine above) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- do InsertCell(""_pstrText_"") quit InsertLink(pstrForm,pidTran,pstrText,pstrParam="",plngPage="",pblnQuitWithString=$$$NO,pstrWindow="") ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; Params: pstrWindow - if not null, open in this window ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 20-Dec-2006 JW SR14235: Added reference to child window ; 11-Nov-2005 JW SR11904: Child user for popups ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new ipio,io,Line,strBack,strText,strURL set strText = "" set strBack = $get(YBACK) if pidTran="""+""" set pidTran = "" set pstrParam = $zconvert(pstrParam,"o","HTML") ; only add YFORM to the stack if not last element if (($piece(strBack,",",$length(strBack,",")-1)'=YFORM)&&(YFORM'=pstrForm)) { set strBack = strBack_YFORM_"," } if pblnQuitWithString { set ipio = $io set io = "temp.txt" open io:"wns":0 use io } new YFORM,YKEY,YBACK,YPARA set strURL = YAKTION_"EP=WWWFORM&YFORM="_pstrForm_"&YKEY="_pidTran_"&YBACK="_strBack if $get(pstrParam)'="" { $$$Append(strURL,"&YPARA="_pstrParam) $$$Append(strURL,"&YAUSWAHL="_pstrParam) } if $get(plngPage)'="" { new YSEITE $$$Append(strURL,"&YSEITE="_plngPage) } $$$Append(strURL,$$WWWCGI2^WWWCGI(pstrWindow'="")) if pstrWindow'="" { write "" } else { write "" } write pstrText write "" if pblnQuitWithString { close io open io:"rs":0 do $ZUTIL(68,40,1) use io for { quit:$zeof=-1 read Line set strText=strText_Line } use ipio close io do $ZUTIL(140,5,io) ; Remove File } quit strText InitialiseGrid(pblnRefreshEveryTime) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- set gStorage = "^mtemp(""ManualQuery"","_$job_")" if ($get(@gStorage@("Key"))'=(YKEY_Y_YFORM_Y_$get(YSEITE)))!(pblnRefreshEveryTime) kill @gStorage set @gStorage@("Key")=YKEY_Y_YFORM_Y_$get(YSEITE) set glngColumn = 1 set glngRow = 0 quit Start(pstrColumns,pstrHeaderText="",pblnUsePaging=$$$NO,pblnRefreshEveryTime=$$$YES, pblnFullWidth=$$$YES,pblnFormFeed=$$$YES,pintSize=2,pintCaptionSize) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Start building a table ; pstrColumns List of column headings ; pstrHeaderText Table Title line ; pblnUsePaging Instead of just displaying cells as they come in, ; store the cell to be displayed at end ; pblnRefreshEveryTime ; pblnFormFeed Print every COMTable on a new page ; pintSize Size of header text (was hard-coded to 2 previously) ; pintCaptionSize Size of table caption text ; ; History: ; 30-Jan-2007 JW SR15358 : Rewrote in brace. ; 23-Mar-2006 PO SR14407 : Added pintCaptionSize - separate caption size from column heading size ; 28-Feb-2006 JW SR13697 : Added spaces ; 11-Apr-2005 SteveS SR12093 : Added pblnFormFeed and pintSize ; 16-Nov-2004 GRF SR10478 : Add pblnFullWidth ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnContinue,intTotalCols,loop,strColumnHeader,strHeading set gblnUsePaging = pblnUsePaging do InitialiseGrid(pblnRefreshEveryTime) set intTotalCols = $listlength(pstrColumns) set strHeading = "" for loop=1:1:intTotalCols { set:strHeading'="" strHeading = strHeading_Y set strColumnHeader = $listget(pstrColumns,loop) if $$IsList^COMUtils(strColumnHeader) set strColumnHeader=$$DecodeError^COMUtilError(strColumnHeader) set strHeading = strHeading_" "_strColumnHeader_" " } ; the header may be a string constant in a list build if $get(pstrHeaderText)'="" { if $$IsList^COMUtils(pstrHeaderText) { set pstrHeaderText = $$DecodeError^COMUtilError(pstrHeaderText) } } set blnContinue = $$$YES if gblnUsePaging { if $data(@gStorage@("Header")) { set blnContinue = $$$NO ; pump out what is currently in the buffer without re-getting data ; (assuming that the developer uses this start as a conditional) do Stop() } else { set @gStorage@("Header") = strHeading set @gStorage@("HeaderText") = pstrHeaderText } } else { if $data(pintCaptionSize)#2 { ; SR14407 do Header(strHeading,pstrHeaderText,pblnFullWidth,pblnFormFeed,pintSize,pintCaptionSize) } else { do Header(strHeading,pstrHeaderText,pblnFullWidth,pblnFormFeed,pintSize) } } quit blnContinue Header(pstrHeading,pstrHeaderText,pblnFullWidth=$$$YES,pblnFormFeed=$$$YES,pintSize=2,pintCaptionSize) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History: ; 23-Mar-2006 PO SR14407: Added pintCaptionSize ; 11-Apr-2005 SteveS SR12093 : Add pblnFormFeed and pintSize ; 16-Nov-2004 GRF SR10478 : Add pblnFullWidth; missing quit ; 02-Jul-2003 SCR Unnewed YDDSATZ ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new ANZM set ANZM = 0 set YDDSATZ = 1 ; This should not be newed ********************* if pblnFormFeed do FF^WWWW() ;FORMFEED if $data(pintCaptionSize)#2 { ; SR14407 if pstrHeaderText'="" write YCR,""_pstrHeaderText_"" } else { if pstrHeaderText'="" write YCR,""_pstrHeaderText_"" } if pblnFullWidth { do START100^WWWTAB } else { do START1^WWWTAB } do HEADER^WWWTAB(pstrHeading,pintSize) ;Use pintSize quit Footer(pstrColumns) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new intCount,loop,strHeading set intCount = $listlength(pstrColumns) set strHeading = "" do NewLine(YDARKGRAY) for loop=1:1:intCount { set strHeading = $listget(pstrColumns,loop) do InsertCell(strHeading) } do EL^WWWTAB quit Stop() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History: ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new lngColumn,lngRow,objData set lngRow = "" if gblnUsePaging { do Header(@gStorage@("Header"),@gStorage@("HeaderText")) ; variable used in insert cell to divert the data to a global ; rather than the screen. reset to display data. set gblnUsePaging = $$$NO for { set lngRow = $order(@gStorage@(lngRow)) quit:lngRow="" do NewLine(@gStorage@(lngRow)) set lngColumn = "" for { set lngColumn = $order(@gStorage@(lngRow,lngColumn)) quit:lngColumn="" set objData = @gStorage@(lngRow,lngColumn) ;objData Construction: pstrText_Y_pstrForm_Y_pidTran_Y_pstrParam_Y_plngPage do InsertCell($piece(objData,Y,1),$piece(objData,Y,2),$piece(objData,Y,3),$piece(objData,Y,4),$piece(objData,Y,5),$piece(objData,Y,6),$piece(objData,Y,7)) } do EndLine() } } do STOP^WWWTAB kill gColour kill gStorage kill gblnUsePaging kill glngColumn kill glngRow quit NewLine(pstrColour) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Lines are normally generated with alternating "white" or "gray" backgrounds ; but an alternate colour can be specified, normally to indicate selection, ; active/inactive status, etc. ; ; YBBSATZ : row number(?) used to determine odd or even. ; ; 13-Sep-2005 RPW SR13306: Store the row and column changes for non paging as well. ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if gblnUsePaging { set glngRow = glngRow+1 set glngColumn = 1 set @gStorage@(glngRow) = $get(pstrColour) } else { set glngRow = glngRow+1 set glngColumn = 1 set gColour = YWHITE if $get(pstrColour)'="" { set gColour = pstrColour } else { if $get(YDDSATZ)'="" { if $get(YDDSATZ)#2=1 set gColour = YWHITE if $get(YDDSATZ)#2=0 set gColour = YGRAY } } do NL^WWWTAB } quit EndLine() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if 'gblnUsePaging do EL^WWWTAB quit QueryTemplate ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; not used in code exactly, just a template of a query ; History : ; 21-Dec-2004 GRF Add ^COMTable to make useful template for external code. ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new lstHeader set lstHeader = "" set lstHeader = lstHeader_$listbuild() if $$Start^COMTable(lstHeader,"header") { for { do NewLine^COMTable("colour") do InsertCell^COMTable("","Form","Key","Param") do InsertCellDate^COMTable("","Form","Key","Param") do InsertCellPercentage^COMTable("","Form","Key","Param") do InsertCurrencyCell^COMTable("",$$$NO,"Form","Key","Param") do InsertCellBoolean^COMTable("","Form","Key","Param") do EndLine^COMTable() } do Stop^COMTable() } quit JSBooleanToBoolean(pstrBoolean,pblnUseBlankForZero=$$$YES) quit $select(pstrBoolean="true":1,1:$select(pblnUseBlankForZero:" ",1:0)) BlankRows(pintColumns,pintRows=5) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Draw blank rows ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 01-Nov-2005 RPW SR-: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new loopCols,loopRows for loopRows=1:1:pintRows { do NewLine() for loopCols=1:1:pintColumns { do InsertCell("") } do EndLine() } quit
